dialog.text: Hey! Are you new here?
Welcome to MakkuGiru High School! I'm Kengo Herajima.*People may seem a bit unfriendly at first but I'm sure you'll settle in soon enough!

You're wondering why I'm here? Well, I guess I do seem a bit out of place, eh?*I'm just your regular young city moose really.*I'm hoping to make it big in ice hockey so moving to a big city seemed like a good move.

options.option: You'll definitely make it far, you seem very athletic and strong!
I hope you'll do great in ice hockey.

dialog.text: You think so? Thank you!!! You're really nice!
I'll do my best!
Uh, well yeah, I know. I'm not letting it stop me though.

Anyway, I like talking to you but I'm having trouble concentrating...*I have a bit of a history with that dog. *It's a huge bully and always puts the blame on me whenever it does something that's against the school rules. *And everyone loves dogs so of course they believe it rather than me...
I hope he goes away before he does anything bad...
You got the dog to leave? Thank you so much!*You seem like a really nice person, let's go out somewhere!

options.option: I have otter things to do.

dialog.text: So, what do we do now ?

options.option: Let's go to La Banquise! I've been craving poutine!

dialog.text: I love that place! I'll meet you there in three hours!
Ok, no problem! You know where to find me if you change your mind!
Hey, feel like going out yet?
Hey! I'm happy you made it!
Tell me, what kind of poutine do you prefer?
Well...

options.option: La Rachel - poutine with bell pepper, mushrooms, and onion

dialog.text: Great choice! Nothing beats the classic one!
Yeah, I think I'll go with that one too. What can I say, I'm a herbivore, hehe!
Hmm, well it's your choice of course, but I hope you wouldn't order moose meat if it was available...
Um, so what kind of things do you like doing?

options.option: Well, I'm not a very complex person!*I like sports a lot, both watching them and taking part myself.*I also really love nature! Hiking's one of my favorite things to do!

dialog.text: That sounds like a very healthy lifestyle!

options.option: It just comes naturally to me! And I try to put in extra effort for my hockey career, of course.

dialog.text: Yesss, poutine arrived!
Hmh...
See those people over there? I can hear them saying some pretty mean things about me.
Well, they're wondering whether I'll be able to eat poutine with such a big snout.*I guess they didn't take into account I might also have better hearing than humans do...
That's

options.option: a pretty mean thing to say...
something that I was wondering about too.

dialog.text: Yeah...
They're making big conclusions about what I can do just based on the way I look.
You too? Well, I do just fine...

I'd like to just let haters be haters, but I wish I didn't have to hear comments like that when I'm having a good time.*I already run into prejudice in hockey constantly. People doubting whether I'm able to do what humans can do because I have a different body structure.*Sometimes it's very frustrating.

options.option: Let's go for a walk before heading home, maybe that will pick up your mood!

dialog.text: Ok!
